title: Aroma Naturals London Unscented Tealights 8 Hours Candles Pack of 100 | Long Burn Candlelight Everday Use | Size D3.72 x H2.5cm | White Wax & Aluminium Cups | Tea Lights Bag of (100)
features: Extra-Long 8-Hour Burn Time: Perfect for extended use without frequent replacements.
Unscented: Perfect for those who prefer a fragrance-free environment or wish to complement other scented products without conflicting aromas.
Convenient & Safe: Each tealight is encased in an aluminum cup to prevent wax spills and ensure safe handling.
Perfect for Any Occasion: Ideal for romantic dinners, weddings, Christmas, Diwali, home ambiance, and relaxation
Bulk Pack for Convenience: Available in Pack of 50 or Pack of 100, perfect for home, restaurants, event planners, and businesses.
description: Upgrade your home ambiance with Aroma Naturals London Large Unscented Tealight Candles, crafted from high-quality paraffin wax for an extended, clean burn of up to 8 hours. These extra-deep tealights provide longer-lasting illumination, making them ideal for special occasions, hospitality, events, or daily home use. Encased in durable aluminum cups, these tealights prevent wax spills and allow for safe, mess-free burning. Their original white wax color gives a classic and elegant appearance, making them suitable for romantic dinners, weddings, relaxation, meditation, spa settings, and emergency lighting. Available in packs of 50 or 100, these extra-long-burning tealights are perfect for home use, restaurants, events, and professional settings.
